translation.en: I mean, she made it my birthday since she didn't know my real one.

translation.vi: Blair, you know whatApril 26th is, don't you?

translation.en: It's the day the royal family died in that car crash.

translation.vi: Maybe she was foundand left on someone's doorstep.

translation.en: If it's true, and Dame Devin and Delancy know it,
translation.vi: If it's true, and Dame Devinand Delancy know it,

translation.en: that would explain why they're so awful to you,
translation.vi: that would explain whythey're so awful to you,

translation.en: because you're the rightful heir to the throne, and not Delancy!
translation.vi: because you're the rightful heirto the throne, and not Delancy!

translation.en: My brilliant daughter noticed that Gardania's poorer sections
translation.vi: My brilliant daughter noticedthat Gardania's poorer sections

translation.en: are a blight to the otherwise beautiful community.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Hey!

translation.en: To remedy this she will take over those areas,
translation.vi: To remedy this she willtake over those areas,

translation.en: bulldoze the buildings, and turn the land into beautiful rolling parks,
translation.vi: bulldoze the buildings, and turn the landinto beautiful rolling parks,

translation.en: But people live in those areas you just knocked down.
translation.vi: But people live in thoseareas you just knocked down.

translation.en: They don't have money. They can't just pick up and move.
translation.vi: They don't have money.They can't just pick up and move.

translation.en: If I were you I'd leave this school immediately
translation.vi: If I were you I'd leavethis school immediately

translation.en: Now, shall we continue our lesson in dinner manners?
translation.vi: Now, shall we continueour lesson in dinner manners?

translation.en: If Delancy gets on the throne she's going to ruin my family,
translation.vi: If Delancy gets on the throneshe's going to ruin my family,

translation.en: She can't, if we can prove someone else is the rightful heir.
translation.vi: She can't, if we can provesomeone else is the rightful heir.

translation.vi: The crown glows whenplaced on the true heir of Gardania.

translation.en: But we have to find it before Delancy's coronation.
translation.vi: But we have to find itbefore Delancy's coronation.

translation.en: [in singsong voice] Fire drill! Fire drill! There's no time!
translation.vi: [in singsong voice] Fire drill!Fire drill! There's no time!

translation.en: Hmm. I don't see a fire drill on the schedule.

translation.en: Plus another 15 minutes trying to untangle Portia from the tether ball pole.

translation.en: but Dame Devin believes you stole her jewelry.
translation.vi: but Dame Devin believesyou stole her jewelry.

translation.en: Not to save your poor family about to lose their home?
translation.vi: Not to save your poor familyabout to lose their home?

translation.en: Didn't you tell me you saw Blair poking around in my office the other day?
translation.vi: Didn't you tell me you saw Blairpoking around in my office the other day?

translation.en: If you have nothing to hide, it shouldn't matter.
translation.vi: If you have nothing to hide,it shouldn't matter.

translation.vi: With the evidence and the witnessI'm afraid I have no choice.

translation.vi: We can't investigateuntil after the ceremony tomorrow.

translation.en: Unless there is another way to explain this.
translation.vi: Unless there is another wayto explain this.

translation.en: Now neither of you will become princesses.
translation.vi: Now neither of you will becomeprincesses.

translation.en: And it's not easy to kick a ball in four-inch heels.
translation.vi: And it's not easyto kick a ball in four-inch heels.

translation.en: Let everyone know the truth before coronation.
